lead_paragraph: A 12-year-old boy and his newfound friend, a rambunctious talking dog, embark on a quest to uncover a long-lost goldmine, unaware they are being trailed by a pair of bumbling thieves bent on taking them hostage.
snippet: A 12-year-old boy and his newfound friend, a rambunctious talking dog, embark on a quest to uncover a long-lost goldmine, unaware they are being trailed by a pair of bumbling thieves bent on taking them hostage.
